content: lion brand pattern # 60563a skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 15 colors 1 ball each *ed note yardage needed will be less if fewer colors are used good pattern to use up afghan project remnants * crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 1 granny square = 6 in 15 cm square special stitch popcorn scarf is made of 16 squares sewn together into a strip follow color sequence to work squares changing colors every round three different motifs are provided similar pattern granny squares scarf #80413ad 1 uses 14 different colors *free account required to access pattern on lion brand s website * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/granny-squares-scarf-80413ad
